guide.title: How to Use Eye Drops
guide.description: A comprehensive guide to properly administering your eye drops

hands.title: Wash Your Hands
hands.description: Thoroughly wash your hands with soap and water

bottle.title: Check the Bottle
bottle.description: Ensure the dropper tip is clean and the solution is clear

contacts.title: Remove Contact Lenses
contacts.description: Take out contact lenses before applying drops

comfort.title: Get Comfortable
comfort.description: Sit or lie down in a comfortable position

pocket.title: Create Eye Pocket
pocket.description: Pull down your lower eyelid to form a pocket

hands.title: Clean Hands
hands.description: Keep your hands clean and steady

drops.title: Apply Drops
drops.description: Hold the bottle above your eye and squeeze gently

close.title: Close Eyes
close.description: Close your eyes gently for 2-3 minutes

tearduct.title: Press Tear Duct
tearduct.description: Apply gentle pressure to your tear duct

multiple.title: Multiple Medications
multiple.description: Wait 10 minutes between different eye drops

storage.title: Store Properly
storage.description: Keep drops in a cool, dry place

anxiety.title: Managing Anxiety
anxiety.description: Take deep breaths and stay relaxed during application

contamination.title: Avoid Contamination
contamination.description: Don't touch the dropper tip to your eye or any surface

missedDose.title: Missed Doses
missedDose.description: If you miss a dose, take it as soon as you remember unless it's almost time for your next dose
